```{r setup}
library(geofaceteAR)
library(patchwork)
```


```{r}

argentina_indra <- get_grid("ARGENTINA") %>% recode_district(type = "indra")
grid_preview(argentina_indra) -> a

argentina_iso <- get_grid("ARGENTINA") %>% recode_district(type = "iso")
grid_preview(argentina_iso) -> b

argentina_indec <- get_grid("ARGENTINA") %>% recode_district(type = "indec")
grid_preview(argentina_indec) -> c


argentina_indec <- get_grid("ARGENTINA") %>% recode_district(type = "indec") %>%  
  dplyr::mutate(name = stringr::str_replace_all(name, " ", "\n"))
grid_preview(argentina_indec, label = "name") -> names



names + a + b+ c + plot_layout(ncol = 4)
```
